metadata.description: An idea that lead to a world dream. Hyperion has set off in search of legendarium. From planet TDH7, using the rarest of material, the clubs were forged. Shipped all over the interstellar pathway, the clubs have withstood the ultimate tests of climate, adversity and the unknown. Hyperionâ€™s ultimate goal, to find virtuous holders of these magically crafted clubs.
metadata.name: the Club(s) #2
